snippet: Thursday’s episode of “Glee” is the first to address the disappearance of Finn, the character played by Cory Monteith, who died this summer from a toxic combination of drugs and alcohol.
abstract: Alessandra Stanley observes that recent episode of television show Glee is first to address the disappearance of Finn, character played by Cory Monteith, who died in summer 2013 from a drug overdose.
lead_paragraph: Thursday’s episode of “Glee” is the first to address the disappearance of Finn, the character played by Cory Monteith, who died this summer from a toxic combination of drugs and alcohol.

headline.seo: ‘Glee’ Addresses the Loss of Cory Monteith
headline.main: Not a Teachable Moment, but a Respectful One
headline.print_headline: Not a Teachable Moment, but a Respectful One
